definition: Qing or Ch'ing dynasty of imperial China (1644-1911)/surname Qing
clear/distinct/quiet/just and honest/pure/to settle or clear up/to clean up or purge

sentences.english: Indirect competitive ELISA (icELISA) was established with this antiserum.
sentences.chinese: 用所制备的抗血清建立间接竞争ELISA方法。

sentences.english: The virus was purified and antiserum was prepared by immunized rabbit.
sentences.chinese: 提纯获得了纯化病毒，并免疫家兔制备出抗血清。

sentences.english: For several decades thereafter control of infectious disease was based exclusively on the use of antisera and vaccines.
sentences.chinese: 此后几十年间，传染病几乎全靠抗血清及疫苗来控制。

sentences.english: Results The specific antiserum against HER2ME protein was obtained.
sentences.chinese: 结果得到了HER2ME蛋白特异性抗血清。

sentences.english: The significance of antisera against protamine was discussed.
sentences.chinese: 并对制备该抗血清的意义予以讨论。

sentences.english: Hemagglutinin inhibition test was performed to detect titer of antiserum.
sentences.chinese: 通过血凝抑制实验检测抗血清的抗体滴度。

sentences.english: The antisera cross-react mainly with DHZR-group cytokinins.
sentences.chinese: 该抗血清主要与本组细胞分裂素发生交叉反应。

sentences.english: A delayed allergic reaction to the injection of an '. ' antiserum '.
sentences.chinese: 对注射到体内的抗血清的延时的过敏反应。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the method of fast-preparing antiserum and its effect.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨快速制备抗血清的方法和效果。

definition: potency/titer (measure of effective concentration in virology or chemical pathology, defined in terms of potency after dilution by titration)/valence (perceived value in psychology)/valency
